data.title: 键入缺少的字母，完成下面的文字
data.blankContent: Tournament Organization: Two decks of cards are assigned to each table. As ____ deck ____ dealt, the ____ is ____ in ____ for ____ following ____. The ____ to ____ the ____ is ____ the ____ sitting ____ the ____ in ____ hand. Players pick a random card from the deck to select the Dealer for the first hand (highest card is first Dealer).
data.partBlankContent: Tournament Organization: Two decks of cards are assigned to each table. As o__ deck i_ dealt, the ot___ is rando_____ in prepa______ for t__ following ha__. The per___ to rand_____ the ca___ is alw___ the pla___ sitting oppo____ the dea___ in th__ hand. Players pick a random card from the deck to select the Dealer for the first hand (highest card is first Dealer).
data.fullContent: Tournament Organization: Two decks of cards are assigned to each table. As one deck is dealt, the other is randomized in preparation for the following hand. The person to randomize the cards is always the player sitting opposite the dealer in that hand. Players pick a random card from the deck to select the Dealer for the first hand (highest card is first Dealer).
data.answer: 比赛组织:每桌分配两副牌。在处理一副牌时，另一副牌被随机化，为下一手牌做准备。随机分配纸牌的人总是坐在发牌者对面的玩家。玩家从牌堆中随机挑选一张牌来选择一手牌的发牌者(最高的牌是第一个发牌者)。
